p:
To test our proposed mechanism of low latitude CO 2 drawdown against observations, we simulated the response of the isotopic composition of organic N ( δ 15N
org ) to a glacial increase in Fe supply, and compared this response to a global compilation of glacial δ 15N records (Supplementary Data 1). These experiments were completed within each ocean state presented in Table 1, so as to isolate the effect of Fe fertilisation from the effects of physical changes. In the following, we discuss the response using the Mk3L
mild ocean state, but each ocean state gave a similar response (Supplementary Fig. 10).
